scripts.sakata: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && node braindevice.js >> ./result/sakata.txt
scripts.sakata+batch: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && python ./util/slicebatch.py && node braindevice-batch.js > ./result/sakata-batch.log
scripts.main+add: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && node main.js >> ./result/nlog.txt
scripts.main+batch: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && python ./util/slicebatch.py && node main-batch.js > ./result/nbatch.log
scripts.py+batch: npx mkdirp result & python ./util/pdnormalize.py && python ./util/slicebatch.py && python ./python/pyndevice-batch.py > ./result/pbatch.log && python ./util/logclean.py
scripts.O2+add: npx mkdirp result & gcc -O2 cdevice.c -lm && a.exe >> ./result/clog.txt
scripts.wincmd: if not exist result mkdir result
